amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund for a Commission for Accountability and Review of Federal Agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3167 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S2271-2272; text: CR S2271) To establish a reserve fund for a Commission for Accountability and Review of Federal Agencies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3167 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Brownback.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3167 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
